general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. In these stages water scarcity or deficit of water causes comparatively greater reduction in yields. Hence, water deficit during these stages should be avoided. Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect crop from water scarcity during summer. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect. Conserving upto 50% water by irrigating alternate rows. The high temperature increases the water requirement of maize crop. Irrigate the crop. Never allow water to remain stagnant for more than six hours in the field. Spread polythene in irrigation channels to save water wastage during irrigation in sandy and loamy soil. High temperature in day hours may lead to wilting in tomato and brinjal. Apply 1g Streptocyclin in 10 liter water in root zone. Mulch coconut leaves 1.8m around a coconut tree to reduce water loss. Cover with paper caps on the newly planted vegetable seedlings during the daytime. In shallow ponds, harvest fingerlings if water temperature rises to 30 degrees Celsius. Ensure enough water depth before introducing fingerlings in a pond.

Check the migration of caterpillars in Black Gram by dusting with Chlorpyriphos. For chemical control spray Novaluron 5.25% + Indoxacarb 4.25% or Lambda Cyhalothrin 4.9 CS. For spraying of insecticides, 200 liters of water per acre is required.

Check the migration of caterpillars in Green Gram by dusting with Chlorpyriphos. For chemical control spray Novaluron 5.25% + Indoxacarb 4.25% or Lambda Cyhalothrin 4.9 CS. For spraying of insecticides, 200 liters of water per acre is required.
To prevent whitefly infestation in Okra, treat seeds with Imidacloprid before sowing. Install yellow sticky traps starting from the 2-3 leaf stage of the crop.
After harvesting of onion, cut the tops leaving 2.0-2.5 cm above bulb. Dry harvested bulbs in well-ventilated concrete floored room.
To control mango hoppers, spray Imidacloprid, Thiamethoxam or Acetamiprid. Application of smoke below the plants can also help in reducing the pest population.
